snippet: In the wake of Dewey & LeBouef's troubles, does the legal industry need to change? The chairman of Seyfarth Shaw calls for big law firms to examine and reimagine their business model.
abstract: In the wake of Dewey & LeBouef's troubles, does the legal industry need to change? The chairman of Seyfarth Shaw calls for big law firms to examine and reimagine their business model.
